--- delete.sql
delete foo where foo = 1 and bar = 2
--- AST
&ast.Delete{
  TableName: &ast.Path{
    Idents: []*ast.Ident{
      &ast.Ident{
        NamePos: 7,
        NameEnd: 10,
        Name:    "foo",
      },
    },
  },
  Where: &ast.Where{
    Where: 11,
    Expr:  &ast.BinaryExpr{
      Op:   "AND",
      Left: &ast.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 17,
          NameEnd: 20,
          Name:    "foo",
        },
        Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 23,
          ValueEnd: 24,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "1",
        },
      },
      Right: &ast.BinaryExpr{
        Op:   "=",
        Left: &ast.Ident{
          NamePos: 29,
          NameEnd: 32,
          Name:    "bar",
        },
        Right: &ast.IntLiteral{
          ValuePos: 35,
          ValueEnd: 36,
          Base:     10,
          Value:    "2",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
DELETE FROM foo WHERE foo = 1 AND bar = 2
